Name: So Long Earth
About the game: So Long Earth is a light paced game that focus on puzzling and adventure, it tells the story of a grumpy protagonist and his new life outside of earth. There is going to be hours of exploration all around the universe while unveiling the story of Dominique alongside his minion. If you enjoy a simple game that you can just turn on, kick back with a controller and relax, then this is just the game for you.
